title: Ihor Luchkevych
text:
Ihor Luchkevych (; born 19 November 1973) is a Ukrainian retired professional <a href="association%20football">football</a> <a href="midfielder">midfielder</a> and current assistant manager at <a href="FC%20Mynai">Mynai</a>.
Career.
After retiring from playing career he worked in the structure of <a href="FC%20Metalurh%20Zaporizhzhia">FC Metalurh Zaporizhzhia</a>. From December 2013 he is working as assistant coach to the <a href="Ukrainian%20First%20League">Ukrainian First League</a> club <a href="FC%20Poltava">FC Poltava</a> after invitation to this position by <a href="Illya%20Blyznyuk">Illya Blyznyuk</a>.
Personal life.
His son <a href="Valeriy%20Luchkevych">Valeriy Luchkevych</a> is also a professional footballer.
